title: Attention! Banana Republic's Friends and Family Sale Is Here—18 Pretty Pieces I'm Eyeing
description: It comes just in time for a spring closet refresh.
excerpt: A fashion editor shares her favorite pieces from the Banana Republic sale.
text: You've made it! It's finally March, which means warm weather, blooming flowers, and outdoor lunch dates are just a couple weeks away. Bright, 65-degree days are now a reality, and if you're anything like me, you're probably itching to shed your heavy layers for something a little lighter. In my opinion, swapping out your winter closet for spring silhouettes should be a designated holiday. There's nothing more fun than shedding your winter coats for fresh pastels (I hear millennial pink is back).If you're inspired to do a little springtime shopping, you're in luck: Banana Republic's Friends and Family event is here. The brand is an editor favorite for easy, elevated basics that go the distance. From now until March 30, you can snag 40% off your full-price purchase, plus free 2–3 day shipping on orders $175 and up with the code BRSHIP.* It gets better: You can also get up to 50% off on select sale styles.* From light layers and springtime dresses to chic linen sets, your new seasonal wardrobe awaits. Scroll on to shop our favorite picks from Banana Republic.*exclusions applyTops and DressesA springtime wardrobe isn't complete without pretty, lightweight dresses and tops. Banana Republic Viscose-Linen Ruched Long Midi Dress Banana Republic Silky Cotton Long-Sleeve Button-Down Shirt Banana Republic Poplin Tie-Waist Midi Dress Banana Republic Chiffon V-Neck Maxi Dress Banana Republic Ribbed Elbow Sleeve Polo Banana Republic Linen Scoop-Neck Shift Dress Banana Republic Poplin Cinch-Waist Mini Dress Banana Republic Poplin Asymmetrical Shirt Dress Banana Republic Cotton-Silk Crew-Neck Sweater Banana Republic Linen Square-Neck Long Vest Banana Republic Drop-Waist Midi Dress Banana Republic Sculpted Ribbed Strapless Top Shorts and JeansGo-to pairs of jeans and linen shorts are essential come springtime. html:
You've made it! It's finally March, which means warm weather, blooming flowers, and outdoor lunch dates are just a couple weeks away. Bright, 65-degree days are now a reality, and if you're anything like me, you're probably itching to shed your heavy layers for something a little lighter. In my opinion, swapping out your winter closet for spring silhouettes should be a designated holiday. There's nothing more fun than shedding your winter coats for fresh pastels (I hear millennial pink is back).

If you're inspired to do a little springtime shopping, you're in luck: Banana Republic's Friends and Family event is here. The brand is an editor favorite for easy, elevated basics that go the distance. From now until March 30, you can snag 40% off your full-price purchase, plus free 2–3 day shipping on orders $175 and up with the code BRSHIP.* It gets better: You can also get up to 50% off on select sale styles.* From light layers and springtime dresses to chic linen sets, your new seasonal wardrobe awaits. Scroll on to shop our favorite picks from Banana Republic.

*exclusions apply

Tops and Dresses

A springtime wardrobe isn't complete without pretty, lightweight dresses and tops.
